mapper.update: MERGE INTO TB_SVST_MCITM_STOC_IZ TB_TGT /* 월별품목재고내역 */ USING ( SELECT D2.BASE_YM , D2.WARE_NO , D2.ITM_PD_CD , D1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY , D1.PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY , D1.PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY , D1.PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY FROM TB_SVST_MCITM_STOC_IZ D1 /* 월별품목재고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCITM_STOC_IZ D2 /* 월별품목재고내역 */ ON D2.WARE_NO = D1.WARE_NO AND D2.ITM_PD_CD = D1.ITM_PD_CD AND D2.BASE_YM = #{mngtYm} WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{mngtYm}, 'YYYYMM'), -1), 'YYYYMM') AND D2.WARE_NO LIKE #{wareDvCd} || '%' AND ( NVL(D2.BTD_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) <> NVL(D1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) OR NVL(D2.BTD_STOC_B_GD_QTY, 0) <> NVL(D1.PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY, 0) OR NVL(D2.BTD_STOC_E_GD_QTY, 0) <> NVL(D1.PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY, 0) OR NVL(D2.BTD_STOC_R_GD_QTY, 0) <> NVL(D1.PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY, 0) ) ) TB_SRC ON ( TB_TGT.BASE_YM = TB_SRC.BASE_YM AND TB_TGT.WARE_NO = TB_SRC.WARE_NO AND TB_TGT.ITM_PD_CD = TB_SRC.ITM_PD_CD AND TB_TGT.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET TB_TGT.BTD_STOC_A_GD_QTY = TB_SRC.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY , TB_TGT.BTD_STOC_B_GD_QTY = TB_SRC.PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY , TB_TGT.BTD_STOC_E_GD_QTY = TB_SRC.PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY , TB_TGT.BTD_STOC_R_GD_QTY = TB_SRC.PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY

MERGE INTO TB_SVST_MCITM_STOC_IZ TB_TGT /* 월별품목재고내역 */ USING ( SELECT S1.BASE_YM , S1.WARE_NO , S1.ITM_PD_CD , GREATEST(S1.NEW_PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) AS NEW_PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY , GREATEST(S1.NEW_PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY, 0) AS NEW_PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY , GREATEST(S1.NEW_PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY, 0) AS NEW_PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY , GREATEST(S1.NEW_PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY, 0) AS NEW_PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_PRCHS_STR_QTY , S1.NEW_PRCHS_STR_B_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_NOM_STR_A_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_NOM_STR_B_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_NOM_STR_E_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_NOM_STR_R_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_QOM_ASN_STR_A_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_QOM_ASN_STR_B_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_QOM_ASN_STR_E_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_QOM_ASN_STR_R_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_QOM_MMT_STR_A_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_QOM_MMT_STR_B_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_QOM_MMT_STR_E_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_QOM_MMT_STR_R_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_RTNGD_STR_INSI_A_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_RTNGD_STR_INSI_B_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_RTNGD_STR_INSI_E_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_RTNGD_STR_INSI_R_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_RTNGD_STR_OTSD_A_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_RTNGD_STR_OTSD_B_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_RTNGD_STR_OTSD_E_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_RTNGD_STR_OTSD_R_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_ETC_STR_A_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_ETC_STR_E_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_ETC_STR_A_GD_QTY1 , S1.NEW_ETC_STR_B_GD_QTY1 , S1.NEW_ETC_STR_E_GD_QTY1 , S1.NEW_ETC_STR_R_GD_QTY1 , S1.NEW_NOM_OSTR_A_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_NOM_OSTR_B_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_NOM_OSTR_E_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_NOM_OSTR_R_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_QOM_ASN_OSTR_A_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_QOM_ASN_OSTR_B_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_QOM_ASN_OSTR_E_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_QOM_ASN_OSTR_R_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_QOM_MMT_OSTR_A_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_QOM_MMT_OSTR_B_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_RTNGD_OSTR_OTSD_A_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_RTNGD_OSTR_OTSD_B_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_RTNGD_OSTR_OTSD_E_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_RTNGD_OSTR_OTSD_R_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_SELL_OSTR_QTY , S1.NEW_SELL_OSTR_B_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_DSU_OSTR_A_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_DSU_OSTR_B_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_DSU_OSTR_E_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_DSU_OSTR_R_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_ETC_OSTR_A_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_ETC_OSTR_B_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_ETC_OSTR_E_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_ETC_OSTR_R_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_REFR_OSTR_A_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_REFR_OSTR_B_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_REFR_OSTR_E_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_REFR_OSTR_R_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_ETC_OSTR_A_GD_QTY1 , S1.NEW_ETC_OSTR_B_GD_QTY1 , S1.NEW_ETC_OSTR_E_GD_QTY1 , S1.NEW_ETC_OSTR_R_GD_QTY1 , S1.NEW_WK_OSTR_A_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_WK_OSTR_B_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_WK_OSTR_E_GD_QTY , S1.NEW_WK_OSTR_R_GD_QTY FROM ( SELECT T1.BASE_YM , T1.WARE_NO , T1.ITM_PD_CD , ( NVL(T1.BTD_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T1.STOC_ACINSP_STR_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T2.PRCHS_STR_QTY, 0) + NVL(T2.NOM_STR_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T2.QOM_ASN_STR_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T2.QOM_MMT_STR_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T2.RTNGD_STR_INSI_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T2.RTNGD_STR_OTSD_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T2.ETC_STR_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T3.WK_STR_A_QTY, 0) + NVL(T4.ETC_STR_A_GD_QTY1, 0) ) - ( NVL(T1.STOC_ACINSP_OSTR_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.NOM_OSTR_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.QOM_ASN_OSTR_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.QOM_MMT_OSTR_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.RTNGD_OSTR_INSI_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.RTNGD_OSTR_OTSD_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.SELL_OSTR_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.DSU_OSTR_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.ETC_OSTR_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.REFR_OSTR_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T6.WK_OSTR_A_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T7.ETC_OSTR_A_GD_QTY1, 0) ) AS NEW_PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY , NVL(T1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) AS PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY , ( NVL(T1.BTD_STOC_B_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T1.STOC_ACINSP_STR_B_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T2.PRCHS_STR_B_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T2.NOM_STR_B_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T2.QOM_ASN_STR_B_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T2.QOM_MMT_STR_B_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T2.RTNGD_STR_INSI_B_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T2.RTNGD_STR_OTSD_B_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T3.WK_STR_B_QTY, 0) + NVL(T4.ETC_STR_B_GD_QTY1, 0) ) - ( NVL(T1.STOC_ACINSP_OSTR_B_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.NOM_OSTR_B_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.QOM_ASN_OSTR_B_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.QOM_MMT_OSTR_B_GD_QTY, + NVL(T5.QOM_ASN_OSTR_E_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.QOM_MMT_OSTR_E_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.RTNGD_OSTR_INSI_E_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.RTNGD_OSTR_OTSD_E_GD_QTY, 0) + NVL(T5.DSU_OSTR_E_GD_QTY, 0) + TB_SVST_ITM_GD_CTR_IZ /* 품목등급조정내역 */ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND STAT_CTR_APY_DT BETWEEN #{mngtYm} || '01' AND #{mngtYm} || '31' AND WARE_NO LIKE #{wareDvCd} || '%' GROUP BY SUBSTR(STAT_CTR_APY_DT, 1, 6), WARE_NO, PD_CD ) T7 ON T7.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND T7.WARE_NO = T1.WARE_NO AND T7.ITM_PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.BASE_YM = #{mngtYm} AND T1.WARE_NO LIKE #{wareDvCd} || '%' ) S1 WHERE S1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY <> S1.NEW_PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY OR S1.PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY <> S1.NEW_PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY OR S1.PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY <> S1.NEW_PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY OR S1.PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY MERGE INTO TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ TB_TGT /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ USING ( SELECT D1.WARE_NO , D1.ITM_PD_CD , D2.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY , D2.PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY , D2.PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY , D2.PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ D1 /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCITM_STOC_IZ D2 /* 월별품목재고내역 */ ON D2.WARE_NO = D1.WARE_NO AND D2.ITM_PD_CD = D1.ITM_PD_CD WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.BASE_YM = #{mngtYm} AND D2.WARE_NO LIKE #{wareDvCd} || '%' AND ( NVL(D1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) <> NVL(D2.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) OR NVL(D1.PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY, 0) <> NVL(D2.PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY, 0) OR NVL(D1.PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY, 0) <> NVL(D2.PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY, 0) OR NVL(D1.PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY, 0) <> NVL(D2.PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY, 0) ) ) TB_SRC ON ( TB_TGT.WARE_NO = TB_SRC.WARE_NO AND TB_TGT.ITM_PD_CD = TB_SRC.ITM_PD_CD AND TB_TGT.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET TB_TGT.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY = TB_SRC.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY , TB_TGT.PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY = TB_SRC.PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY , TB_TGT.PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY = TB_SRC.PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY , TB_TGT.PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY = TB_SRC.PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY

MERGE INTO TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ TB_TGT /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ USING ( SELECT D1.WARE_NO , D1.ITM_PD_CD , NVL(D2.MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) AS MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY , NVL(D2.MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY, 0) AS MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY , NVL(D2.MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY, 0) AS MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY , NVL(D2.MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY, 0) AS MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ D1 /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT STR_WARE_NO , ITM_PD_CD , SUM(CASE WHEN ITM_GD_CD = 'A' THEN STR_QTY END) AS MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY , SUM(CASE WHEN ITM_GD_CD = 'B' THEN STR_QTY END) AS MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY , SUM(CASE WHEN ITM_GD_CD = 'E' THEN STR_QTY END) AS MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY , SUM(CASE WHEN ITM_GD_CD = 'R' THEN STR_QTY END) AS MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY FROM TB_SVST_ITM_STR_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_NUMBER(STR_WARE_NO) > 100000 AND STR_CONF_DT IS NULL GROUP BY STR_WARE_NO, ITM_PD_CD ) D2 ON D2.STR_WARE_NO = D1.WARE_NO AND D2.ITM_PD_CD = D1.ITM_PD_CD WHERE NVL(D1.MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) <> NVL(D2.MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) OR NVL(D1.MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY, 0) <> NVL(D2.MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY, 0) OR NVL(D1.MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY, 0) <> NVL(D2.MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY, 0) OR NVL(D1.MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY, 0) <> NVL(D2.MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY, 0) ) TB_SRC ON ( TB_TGT.WARE_NO = TB_SRC.WARE_NO AND TB_TGT.ITM_PD_CD = TB_SRC.ITM_PD_CD AND TB_TGT.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET TB_TGT.MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY = TB_SRC.MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY , TB_TGT.MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY = TB_SRC.MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY , TB_TGT.MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY = TB_SRC.MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY , TB_TGT.MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY = TB_SRC.MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY
